name: StaticBucketMap_putTest
description: Unit tests for the put method of the StaticBucketMap class.

test_cases.name: testPutNewKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method with a new key, ensuring the value is correctly added and retrieved.

test_cases.name: testPutExistingKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method with an existing key, ensuring the value is correctly updated and retrieved.

test_cases.name: testPutNullKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method with a null key, ensuring the value is correctly added and retrieved.

test_cases.name: testPutNullValue
test_cases.description: Tests the put method with a null value, ensuring the null value is correctly added and retrieved.

test_cases.name: testPutMultipleKeys
test_cases.description: Tests the put method with multiple keys, ensuring each key-value pair is correctly added and retrieved.

test_cases.name: testPutAndCheckContainsKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method and checks if the key is contained in the map, ensuring the key is correctly added and recognized.

test_cases.name: testPutAndRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the put method and then removes the key, ensuring the key-value pair is correctly added, removed, and not retrievable.
